basic.description:
{Basic Sorcery}

Causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional {5% damage} in combat and increases {spell power by 1}.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Sorcery}

Causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional {10% damage} in combat and increases {spell power by 2}.

expert.description:
{Expert Sorcery}

Causes a hero's spells to inflict an additional {20% damage} in combat and increases {spell power by 3}.
